articles.title: House-size asteroid will pass between Earth and moon on May 21 - Space
articles.description: The asteroid poses no threat to the moon or Earth.
articles.content:
A newly discovered house-size asteroid is set to make a close, yet harmless approach to Earth on May 21, passing within one-third of the Earth-moon distance.
The close approach will happen at approx… [+2689 chars]
